content: Securityd d. FC 1146 (optional) is available for IBM z16 A01 and IBM z15 T01 only. Minimum, DS8910 or DS8890 storage, CPACF enablement and FICON Express16SA or FICON Express32S LX/SX. Ye e. Feature is operating system-independent (that is transparent to the operating system); operating system support is needed only for displaying, configuration, and monitoring (fixes might be required).
